flawed_nl_solution:
A total of 10*2=<<10*2=20>>20 students went on the field trip.
Some chaperones showed up, letting the group grow to 20+5=<<20+5=25>>25 individuals.
The teachers had to come as well, making the group as big as 25+2=<<25+2=27>>27 individuals.
When the school day ended, 27-10=<<27-10=21>>21 individuals were left.
A couple of chaperones followed suit, leaving 21-2=<<21-2=19>>19 people at the zoo.
#### 19

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 17, not 21. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
